attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1154

Date: 2003-07-31

                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Foreign Affairs, pursuant to Vote No. 1 (Foreign Affairs) of Appropriation Act No. 2, 2003-2004, hereby appoints:

 

Christopher Alexander as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to Afghanistan;

 

Roderick Bell as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Yemen and to the Kingdom of Bahrain;

 

Brian Davis as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Syrian Arab Republic;

 

Lucie Edwards as High Commissioner for Canada in the Republic of India, with concurrent accreditation as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Kingdom of Nepal;

 

Bernard Giroux as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Chile;

 

Margaret Huber as High Commissioner for Canada in the Islamic Republic of Pakistan;

 

Anthony Knill as Consul General of Canada at Miami (United States of America);

 

Michèle Lévesque as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Côte d’Ivoire, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Niger and to the Republic of Benin;







.../2

- 2 -


 

Melvyn MacDonald as High Commissioner for Canada in Malaysia;

 

Robert Mackenzie as Consul General of Canada at Shanghai (People’s Republic of China);

 

Patrick Parisot as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Portuguese Republic;

 

Franco Pillarella as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to Romania, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Bulgaria and to the Republic of Moldova;

 

Sandelle Scrimshaw as High Commissioner for Canada in the Republic of South Africa, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Mauritius;

 

Donald Sinclair as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the State of Israel; and

 

Peter Sutherland as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of the Philippines.
